## IChartPointerEvent interface

Wrapper of `MouseEvent` with position translated into chart coordinate systems.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IChartPointerEvent<TEvent extends MouseEvent> 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  [pointerClipPosition](./core.ichartpointerevent.pointerclipposition.md) | IReadonlyVec2&lt;Float32Array&gt; |  |
|  [pointerCssPosition](./core.ichartpointerevent.pointercssposition.md) | IReadonlyVec2&lt;Float32Array&gt; | NB this has an origin in the BOTTOM left corner (native is top left). |
